mapper.sql: a.polymerization as polymerization, a.trace_id as traceId, a.other as other, a.level as level, a.use_time as useTime, a.remark as remark, a.project_name as projectName, a.update_date as updateDate, a.start_time as startTime, a.log_type as logType, a.update_user as updateUser, a.rpc_id as rpcId, a.thread_name as threadName, a.id as id, a.create_user as createUser, a.create_date as createDate, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag
mapper.select:
select
from sys_trace_info a where delete_flag = 0 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert sys_trace_info(polymerization, trace_id, other, level, use_time, remark, project_name, update_date, start_time, log_type, update_user, rpc_id, thread_name, id, create_user, create_date, delete_flag) values ( #{polymerization}, #{traceId}, #{other}, #{level}, #{useTime}, #{remark}, #{projectName}, #{updateDate}, #{startTime}, #{logType}, #{updateUser}, #{rpcId}, #{threadName}, #{id}, #{createUser}, #{createDate}, #{deleteFlag} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_trace_info a where delete_flag = 0
and ${arg.name} ${arg.symbol} #{arg.data}

select
from sys_trace_info a where delete_flag = 0 and trace_id = #{value}
